name: places/ChIJdxetrLh8h64Rkvt__YAI_wc
adrFormatAddress: 22 N 6th St, Brooklyn, NY 11249, USA

originalText.text:
Our compliments to the chef! Huge kudos to Chef Yllan Laloum for contributing his culinary talents to our intimate backyard wedding celebration! Our friends and family are still talking about how much they enjoyed the exceptional meal he provided, and he was a complete delight to work with. We look forward to working with Chef Yllan many times in the future.

Photo credit: Mademoiselle Fiona Photography

originalText.text: Chef Yllan has catered several amazing dinner parties at our apartment and we continue to look forward to many more in the future.  His attention to every detail is truly amazing. Our guests still talk about how incredible the food is and ask when we will host next!!

text.text: Chef Yllan has catered several amazing dinner parties at our apartment and we continue to look forward to many more in the future.  His attention to every detail is truly amazing. Our guests still talk about how incredible the food is and ask when we will host next!!

originalText.text:
Chef Yllan prepared an amazing meal for my father’s 70th birthday! Everything was outstanding!!! He made the evening so memorable. I can’t wait to plan another party with him!!! I highly recommend Chef Yllan to everyone now!!!

Chef Yllan worked with me to design a menu that suited everyone in attendance….those with gluten and nut allergies, our vegetarian friends…and it was all so delicious!

The chef was very personable and we enjoyed having him in our home!

originalText.text: Private chef Yllan did a fantastic job with our Christmas Eve dinner out in the Hamptons. The food was unbelievably good, he has such tremendous talent, a brilliant chef and the most professional, polite and charming personality. He works fast and inspired us with the most wonderful creations. A memorable feast I’ve been dreaming of ever since. Merci beaucoup, Yllan! See you again soon, I hope!

text.text: Private chef Yllan did a fantastic job with our Christmas Eve dinner out in the Hamptons. The food was unbelievably good, he has such tremendous talent, a brilliant chef and the most professional, polite and charming personality. He works fast and inspired us with the most wonderful creations. A memorable feast I’ve been dreaming of ever since. Merci beaucoup, Yllan! See you again soon, I hope!

originalText.text: Last year, we hosted Thanksgiving and with very little time to prepare, we chose to have Chef Yllan plan and cook for our dinner in Short Hills (which included both adults and kids). Yllan prepared the menu (with our collaboration) that had all the classic dishes which included a perfectly cooked turkey, insane mashed potatoes, short ribs, stuffing and a variety of decadent desserts. Yllan was an absolute pro and was a pleasure to work with. His ridiculous culinary skills were on full display and it was clear he has been classically trained; he also gave me some great tips along the way. We were bummed he wasn't available for us this year, but will definitely be using again. If you are looking for someone to host any type of private event (big or small), with any type of vibe Yllan is your guy! He has done parties for friends of ours in NYC and in NJ and does not disappoint!
